Vlad: So Starstorm, will you grant me honor and allow me to fight you, 
or will you try another cheap trick that bastards like you do?

He was obviously taunting her. What was to know is how she would 
react.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Phoenix::
> 
> "Uhh, yeah, why don't I do that ..." Phoenix stammers as she backs 
> out of the room, clearly expecting a fight - as though she's seen 
> this kind of confrontation before ...
>

> >

> us

he

what,
